data.name: Cicadas
data.detailed_description:
This is a galgame about sweet young love. The haunting story is brought to you as visual novel, with beautiful music and voice through and through. Interacting with pretty girls to push the story forward.

The summer 6 years ago, my life ended, once.

The earthquake 6 years ago took away my family and most of the memories of my childhood.
Adopted by a new family, I was given a new name, Chen.
Finally the unease of memory loss was put to peace.
The long lost memories were buried deep inside my mind, along with the buzzing of the cicadas.
'Sorry, I gotta wait, wait for him to find me. Before that I can't be with any one.'
The girl was drowning in the long wait and lies.
'Why...why do all the things haunts me when they interfere?'
The girl was burdened by shackles of crying for freedom.
'The city and its stars, are so different, alive or dead different.
The girl was buried in darkness and trying to find light.

This summer, the memories haunt you, along with the buzz of cicadas.


Kong

Height：169CM
Weight：50kg
Age：16

Secret crush of childhood, friend and classmate.
Adrenaline junkie, famous of the 'Punch of 1000 Exploding Suns'. She seems doesn't care but she actually does.
She's always waitinc for him, without knowing if he's gonna be here.
Because

——'Those who hurt you most, will imprint you, too.'

Shen

Height：155CM
Weight：40KG
Age：17

Nerd deskmate of the MC, always helps her with tasks.
She keeps distance with everyone with her typical light smile, so she's pretty much invisible to others.
She reacts slowly though she was always top of class.
She enjoys looking at the stars, now and always, because

——'As the dark night sky is the despair, twinkling stars are the hope.'

Yu

Height：162CM
Weight：46KG
Age：15

Perfect in grades, family, personality and appearance.
Don't like to talk, or smile, or making anyone feel close.
Few friends, and hw was not bother by that.
Loves tiramisu, pinao even more, because

——'Desire is the wings of freedom, not shackles.'

Chen

MC, Art and Physical student, has mad skills playing the guitar.
Lost ostmost of his memories in a earthquake, and have severe PTSD and clautrophobia.
Steady hands, takes responsibility, but no dreams.
Loves his life, all the calm and peace. Because

'I just love a simple day.'

Shin

Chen's brother, extremely capable, and handsome, too.
Neat, mild, takes care of Chen's life,but...
He's in a committed relationship.

'There's fried rice in the fridge, microwave, 2 minutes!'

Fung

Chen's best buddy, big-time player, big-time repeater.
Good-looking, but to loud and thick-skinned. His only fear is Kong.
He's always forced to pay for everyone's meal.

'Sh...shit...my...my wallet...s...sorry...I couldn't...'

Lin

Shin's girl, nice family background, a very polite girl.
Warm-hearted, kind of shy and not willing to talk, but a girl of her words.

'If'Idf you need me, I'll be there.'

Shao

Yu's father, a very successful man.
Has his own rules and tends to follow them.

'If this is what you want, I'll be there for you. But you must get your hand dirty and do it.'

data.short_description: This is a galgame about sweet young love. The haunting story is brought to you as visual novel, with beautiful music and voice through and through. Interacting with pretty girls to push the story forward.
data.supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: Intel Core2DUO 2GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX9.0 VRAM128MB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: PCM
